commits.message:
Majoring Cloudformation Refactoring to deal with short activities, to allow for for efficient cancellation.
Also converted case/steps with ENUM in Activities.  Delete as well.
Removed update/rollback update functions as not yet used
Removed all unsupported resources
Split "rollback" out of the create workflow and made it its own workflow (MonitorCreate).  This allows stack timeouts to be monitored as well.
Several new properties have also been added, related to how long to wait for a resource to be created.
While loops have been replaced with Activity Retries
Stories/Bugs fixed:
EUCA-9479 'Retain' Delete policy now honored
EUCA-9509 CREATE_FAILED status now shows if resources do not create
EUCA-9510 Now the root cause of an error is shown in the status_reason field
EUCA-9842 We can now delete a stack that is in the middle of being created
EUCA-9841 SWF is working with negative testing
EUCA-9846 Stack timeout is now supported
EUCA-9843 One bucket (system user bucket) used for Wait Condition & Handle
EUCA-10019 Using small activities and "retry" for delete and loops in create
